name: Death's Alcove
description:
Death's Alcove is a small project for digital media that is made using Bitsy. You play as a new Death who has been given the task of enacting judgment on humanity and those who knock at Death's door. 

The Reaper is the one that resides above you in rank and will judge you in return based on your collections of souls. Walk around with WASD, and interact by walking into something you find interesting.

DIG4715

John Collera
